title: Stock Futures Rise Ahead of Manufacturing Data
sub_head: S&P 500 futures edge up a day after the index set a record high
body:
U.S. stock futures ticked up Tuesday, suggesting the New Yearâ€™s strong start will continue ahead of fresh data on manufacturing and the labor market.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 added 0.2% after the broad-market index closed up 0.6% and notched a record on Monday. Dow Jones Industrial Average and Nasdaq-100 futures also climbed 0.2% Tuesday.
